titles.title: Enhanced Access to Medicaid Services Act of 2013
A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to apply the Medicaid primary care payment rate to additional physician providers of primary care services.
Enhanced Access to Medicaid Services Act of 2013

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Enhanced Access to Medicaid Services Act of 2013 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to apply the Medicaid primary care payment rate in 2013 and 2014 to additional physicians with a primary specialty designation of neurology, psychiatry, or obstetrics and gynecology.
